content: closing 14 inv decrease repeat around thread the yarn onto a darning needle and sew closed attaching the head and body align both parts up so the 3sc increases line up begin half way the image below shows where the yarn should be attached sew around but stop at the opposite side this creates his mouth you may need to define the bottom lip by running a stitch around now check the video description box for timestamps on how to do this eyes with white yarn make 4 magic_ring 9 half_double_crochet fasten_off using the inv method place 8 mm safety eyes into 2 of the rings and with the cupped side of the fastener facing up melt the stalk using a lighter then flatten using the end of a pencil pen or hook round sew the back of the eye with the safety eye facing up using both loops from the back and the 3 loop of the front part see image below once you ve made both place side by side on top of your toad and sew securely here s the toad from the back arms make 2 chain 9 stitches nd in the 2 chain from hook single_crochet ch1 half_double_crochet all in the same stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch chain 4 working back along the chain single_crochet ch1 half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch repeat one more time chain 4 single_crochet ch1 half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch now slip_stitch along the remaining chains use the back bumps fasten_off legs make 2 repeat the above steps for the arms but start with chain 11 tongue with pink chain 13 stitches begin in the second chain from hook 1 1dc ch1 3 ex half_double_crochet all in the same stitch continue along the chain 1sc 1sc slip_stitch to the end this time work into the stitch and not the back bumps leave a long tail to sew in do this at an angle at the very back of the right side the full assembly is on the video check the description box below the video for the time stamps to set the arms into position spray with tepid water until very wet and use pins to hold in place allow to dry
